description:
The Ninety Minute Chair is a comfortable lounge chair, which has been field
tested at the NY Makerfaire as well as the pantry of MakerBot's Headquarters.

Comprised of 9 interlocking pieces, the lounge chair is easily constructed and
secured with screws, pegs or adhesives. As shown, one chair can be milled from
two sheets of 4’x8’ material, while three sheets of material will efficiently
yield a pair of lounge chairs.

A set of keys, which simplify assembly and lock the furniture parts into place,
are included in the download files for milling alongside your chair parts.
Alternately, the keys can be 3D printed in colorful ABS plastic, from .stl files
found at AtFAB's [Thingiverse page][].

[Thingiverse page]: http://www.thingiverse.com/atfab
name: 90 Minute Chair
